text: Michael Flynn pled guilty to lying to
FBI agents about conversations with the
Russian ambassador a sign that he's
cooperating with the special
prosecutor's investigation and
potentially bringing the probe into
president Trump's inner circle mr. Flynn
was a close advisor to the resident
during his campaign and later served as
his national security advisor but his
tenure lasted less than a month here's a
brief timeline of the events and
conversations that led to mr. Flynn's
aster from office and ultimately federal
criminal charges Donald Trump offered
mr. Flynn the post of national security
adviser on November 18th
in late December around the time that
the Obama administration had imposed
sanctions on Russia mr. Flynn spoke with
the Russian ambassador to the United
States sergeich is lyac according to the
FBI wiretaps that the phone
conversations revealed that mr. Flynn
suggested to the Ambassador that the
removal of the sanctions would be
possible following the call both mr.
Flynn and other White House officials
including vice president Mike Pence had
described the call as relatively
unsubstantial was strictly coincidental
that they had a conversation in late
January the Justice Department had
warned the White House that mr. Flynn
had now been fully candid about the
conversation and that he may be
vulnerable to blackmail as a result as
of today we are officially putting Iran
on notice in early February mr. Flynn
had begun acting as national security
adviser and on February 8th he had
denied talking about sanctions in an
interview with The Washington Post on
February 13th there were conflicting
reports throughout the day about mr.
Flint's future with the administration
but by that evening he had resigned mr.
Flynn was charged with making false
statements to FBI agents about
discussions with the Russian ambassador
a crime that carries up to five years in
prison
more broadly mr. Flynn's guilty plea is
the latest indication that he's
providing information to the special
counsel which may help advance the
investigations that have dogged mr.
Trump's first year in office mr. Flynn
is the fourth Trump associate to be
charged
